Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Cigarette \Cig`a*rette"\, n. [F. cigarette.] A little cigar; a little fine tobacco rolled in paper for smoking. [Also spelled {cigaret}.]
Syn: cigarette, fag, weed. [1913 Webster]
cigarette n : finely ground tobacco wrapped in paper; for smoking [syn: {cigaret}, {coffin nail}, {butt}, {fag}]
